About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

After completing a Fullstack JavaScript Web Development Bootcamp at Spiced Academy I landed my first job at bleech - leading WordPress Development Agency in Berlin

I built entirely custom websites based on Sketch Designs that were interactive and responsive for mobile. I enjoy translating the design into a pixel-perfect code using HTML / SCSS and JavaScript. I use to collaborate with several team members on one project using Git as our version control system. Having daily pull-requests had a substantial positive impact on my skills.

Building stunning websites and applications that have an impact is what I love to do and where I want to level up.

I love all things digital, am open-minded, curious and empathic and would love to support your agency with my enthusiasm and my skills. If I am not coding or studying, I enjoy being in nature with my two dogs Lucy and Wanja.
